title: Drawing, "Four Caryatids", 1800–25
medium: Pen and dark brown ink, brush with sepia wash over traces of graphite on light blue laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Figures one beside the other; first and fourth raising both arms; third raises right; second figure crosses arms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Four Caryatids", 1800–25.
1800–25. Pen and dark brown ink, brush with sepia wash over traces of graphite on light blue laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2255.
